body_html:
This comment from @yzhwang seems to be the main issue (although it's unknown if this will significantly increase performance):

In the future we will make PSEUDO_HALF_CONFIG and TRUE_HALF_CONFIG transparent to the users by adding these two configs to autotune.

So, I'm assigning to @yzhwang.

body:
This comment from @yzhwang seems to be the main issue (although it's unknown if this will significantly increase performance):
>In the future we will make PSEUDO_HALF_CONFIG and TRUE_HALF_CONFIG transparent to the users by adding these two configs to autotune.

So, I'm assigning to @yzhwang.
